website_summaries.verdict: The Blazer Mid Rebel from Nike puts a unique spin on an icon. Despite several rebellious tweaks like the zipper, asymmetrical lacing system and deconstructed Swoosh, these sneakers remain to carry the identity of the Nike Blazer.The lacing system and the mid-top construction may need some getting used to especially for those who are used to low-top sneakers, but given some of the style points, it is worth a try.
pros: Some of those who have reviewed the Nike Blazer Mid Rebel shoes are pleased with their purchase
Its unique construction captivates the few commenters into buying these sneakers
Because a wearer is highly satisfied with her purchase, she bought the other two colorways from the collection
A shopper is delighted because this pair goes well with jeans and pants
These are extremely stylish according to a wearer
A couple of users have praised the model because there are various colorways that are available for purchase
cons: Although the diagonal lacing system looks good in pictures, wearing them on actual doesn't produce a good look, said some of the consumers
The tongue of this version of Nike Blazer Mid is too puffy, stated one reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nike sneakers for girls or women
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vintage nike blazers but with a unique modern twist.....bought them to save them for my daughter as one of her christmas presents...she had already tried them on in a store ( foot locker) and like almost all nike shoes you have to go up a half size from your normal size....we are sneaker collectors ( my wife and i) and we can guarantee that just about every nike shoe runs half size smaller than lets say adidas or pumas just to give you and example
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: They are NOT white like pictured they are like a baby mint blue color. Not happy with product
customer_reviews.author: julian

customer_reviews.title: Could be better!
customer_reviews.text: A little tight by my toes and did not like th way they laced not enough support for me I gave it 3 stars it’s a decent sneaker just not for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s pictured
customer_reviews.text: These are aqua blue. Says they’re white. So that’s fan freakin tastic
customer_reviews.author: AshleyJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cool
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. They look awesome and trendy with any outfit. I was worried another the asymmetrical cut but it works out, the contrast side zip is everything. Getting a second pair in a diff color for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Dawg owner

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, strange fit...back they went!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looked very cute until I attempted to put them on. They seemed very off center and narrow. I couldn't even get it on my foot and I don't have wide feet. I immediately sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: glass girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. However it came with the right one stained....that's not good. They fit a little on the narrow side also.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Peoples

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not white as in the pictures, I did not read the reviews before ordering . Great sneakers other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not what they seem
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered these and in the picture they look white and they are MINT GREEN.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK FRANCKE

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is fake!!! Not the original one!! It shouldn't be listed. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Fake Nike Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the laugh. These are fake. The Nike written on the heel is somehow both backwards and upside down. Tongue has exposed foam. Came in a plain cardboard box. No tag. They are not Nike shoes but clearly counterfeit product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fake Nikes
customer_reviews.text: On the tongue of the shoe there is foam and on the back of the shoe “NIKE” is spelt backwards? Also the zipper is very cheap. These are not authentic do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: skylar lavallee
